beats.visual: Mochi calibrates trampoline knobs labeled 'cartoon mode'.
Test jump launches Mochi into slow orbit around birdbath.
Mochi scribbles equations midair with floating chalk.
Trampoline morphs into wave sending Mochi surfing.
Gravity pauses; Mochi floats sipping juice box.
Mochi rebounds downward, trampoline becomes giant drum.
beats.gag_note: Drum beat syncs with heartbeat monitor.

beats.visual: Backflip chain reaction launches garden gnomes cheering.
Mochi lands hero pose as trampoline bows politely.
Clip ends with slow float high-five to camera.

tts_line: Mochi thinks gravity is just a polite suggestion.
style_prompt: cartoon chubby white cat, plush texture hints, clean bold outlines, flat pastel colors, soft rim light, dynamic angle, vertical 9:16, backyard trampoline lab with floating chalk equations, fast cuts, vertical 9:16
